SQL.LOAD: SELECT EQUIPMENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, MODEL, MASTER_EQUIPMENT_ID, REPAIRABLE_ID, MANUFACTURER_ID, EQUIPMENT_CLASS_ID, EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY, EFFECTIVE, EXPIRATION, IS_MASTER_EQUIPMENT, COLOR_XCD, MEMORY_XCD, CARRIER_XCD FROM ELP_EQUIPMENT WHERE EQUIPMENT_ID = :equipment_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST:
SELECT E.EQUIPMENT_ID, E.DESCRIPTION, E.MODEL, M.DESCRIPTION AS MANUFACTURER, DITEC.TRANSLATION AS EQUIPMENT_CLASS, DITET.TRANSLATION AS EQUIPMENT_TYPE, EWM.SKU_NUMBER SKU, EWM.RISK_TYPE_ID, elp_utl_lov.Description_by_Code('EQPCOLOR',elp_utl_lov.code(E.COLOR_XCD),:language_id) as color_xcd, elp_utl_lov.Description_by_Code('EQPMEMORY',elp_utl_lov.code(E.MEMORY_XCD),:language_id) memory_xcd, elp_utl_lov.Description_by_Code('EQPCARRIER',elp_utl_lov.code(E.CARRIER_XCD),:language_id) carrier_xcd
FROM ELITA.ELP_EQUIPMENT E INNER JOIN ELP_MANUFACTURER M ON E.MANUFACTURER_ID = M.MANUFACTURER_ID LEFT JOIN ELP_WARRANTY_MASTER EWM ON UPPER(M.DESCRIPTION) = UPPER(EWM.MANUFACTURER_NAME) AND EWM.MODEL_NUMBER = E.MODEL, ELP_LIST_ITEM LIEC, ELP_LIST LEC, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION DITEC, ELP_LIST_ITEM LIET, ELP_LIST LET, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION DITET
WHERE LIEC.LIST_ID = LEC.LIST_ID AND LIET.LIST_ID = LET.LIST_ID AND E.EQUIPMENT_CLASS_ID = LIEC.LIST_ITEM_ID AND E.EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID = LIET.LIST_ITEM_ID AND DITEC.DICT_ITEM_ID = LIEC.DICT_ITEM_ID AND DITET.DICT_ITEM_ID = LIET.DICT_ITEM_ID AND LEC.CODE = 'EQPCLS' AND LET.CODE = 'EQPTYPE' AND DITEC.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id AND --dynamic_where_clause DITET.LANGUAGE_ID = DITEC.LANGUAGE_ID --dynamic_order_by_clause
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_EQUIPMENT_LIST:
SELECT DISTINCT E.EQUIPMENT_ID, E.DESCRIPTION, E.MODEL, M.DESCRIPTION AS MANUFACTURER, DITEC.TRANSLATION AS EQUIPMENT_CLASS, DITET.TRANSLATION AS EQUIPMENT_TYPE, EWM.SKU_NUMBER SKU, EWM.RISK_TYPE_ID, elp_utl_lov.Description_by_Code('EQPCOLOR',elp_utl_lov.code(E.COLOR_XCD),:language_id) as color_xcd, elp_utl_lov.Description_by_Code('EQPMEMORY',elp_utl_lov.code(E.MEMORY_XCD),:language_id) memory_xcd, elp_utl_lov.Description_by_Code('EQPCARRIER',elp_utl_lov.code(E.CARRIER_XCD),:language_id) carrier_xcd
FROM ELITA.ELP_EQUIPMENT E INNER JOIN ELP_MANUFACTURER M ON E.MANUFACTURER_ID = M.MANUFACTURER_ID LEFT JOIN ELP_WARRANTY_MASTER EWM ON UPPER(M.DESCRIPTION) = UPPER(EWM.MANUFACTURER_NAME) AND EWM.MODEL_NUMBER = E.MODEL INNER JOIN ELP_EQUIPMENT_LIST_DETAIL ELSTD ON E.EQUIPMENT_ID = ELSTD.EQUIPMENT_ID INNER JOIN ELP_EQUIPMENT_LIST ELST ON ELSTD.EQUIPMENT_LIST_ID = ELST.EQUIPMENT_LIST_ID, ELP_LIST_ITEM LIEC, ELP_LIST LEC, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION DITEC, ELP_LIST_ITEM LIET, ELP_LIST LET, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION DITET WHERE LIEC.LIST_ID = LEC.LIST_ID AND LIET.LIST_ID = LET.LIST_ID AND E.EQUIPMENT_CLASS_ID = LIEC.LIST_ITEM_ID AND E.EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID = LIET.LIST_ITEM_ID AND DITEC.DICT_ITEM_ID = LIEC.DICT_ITEM_ID AND DITET.DICT_ITEM_ID = LIET.DICT_ITEM_ID AND LEC.CODE = 'EQPCLS' AND LET.CODE = 'EQPTYPE' AND DITEC.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id AND ELST.CODE = :EQUIP_LIST_CODE AND :EFF_DATE BETWEEN ELST.EFFECTIVE AND ELST.EXPIRATION AND --dynamic_where_clause DITET.LANGUAGE_ID = DITEC.LANGUAGE_ID --dynamic_order_by_clause
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO ELP_EQUIPMENT ( equipment_id, description, model, master_equipment_id, repairable_id, manufacturer_id, equipment_class_id, equipment_type_id, effective, expiration, is_master_equipment, color_xcd, memory_xcd, carrier_xcd ) VALUES ( :equipment_id, :description, :model, :master_equipment_id, :repairable_id, :manufacturer_id, :equipment_class_id, :equipment_type_id, :effective, :expiration, :is_master_equipment, case when :color_xcd = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' then null else :color_xcd end, :memory_xcd, :carrier_xcd )
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE ELP_EQUIPMENT SET description = :description, model = :model, master_equipment_id = :master_equipment_id, repairable_id = :repairable_id, manufacturer_id = :manufacturer_id, equipment_class_id = :equipment_class_id, equipment_type_id = :equipment_type_id, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, is_master_equipment = :is_master_equipment, color_xcd = :color_xcd, memory_xcd = :memory_xcd, carrier_xcd = :carrier_xcd where equipment_id = :equipment_id
SQL.SEARCH_Equipment_List_detail: SELECT EQ.EQUIPMENT_ID ID, EQ.DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_EQUIPMENT EQ INNER JOIN ELP_MANUFACTURER EM ON EQ.MANUFACTURER_ID = EM.MANUFACTURER_ID WHERE (SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL) BETWEEN EQ.EFFECTIVE AND EQ.EXPIRATION AND EM.COMPANY_GROUP_ID = :COMPANY_GROUP_ID AND EQ.EQUIPMENT_TYPE_ID != :PARENT_EQUIPMENT_TYPE
SQL.LOAD_EQUIPMENT_LIST_FOR_WS: SELECT M.DESCRIPTION AS MANUFACTURER, E.MODEL FROM ELITA.ELP_EQUIPMENT E, ELP_MANUFACTURER M WHERE E.EQUIPMENT_ID in ( select DISTINCT EQUIPMENT_ID from ELP_EQUIPMENT_LIST EL , ELP_EQUIPMENT_LIST_DETAIL ELD WHERE ELD.EQUIPMENT_LIST_ID = EL.EQUIPMENT_LIST_ID AND EL.CODE = :equipment_code) AND E.MANUFACTURER_ID = M.MANUFACTURER_ID --AND M.COMPANY_GROUP_ID = :company_group_id order by M.DESCRIPTION,E.MODEL
SQL.FIND_EQUIPMENT_BY_MAKE_MODEL_DEALER: select elp_equipment.equipment_id from elp_dealer inner join elp_equipment_list on elp_equipment_list.code = elp_dealer.equipment_list_code and :lookup_date between elp_equipment_list.effective and elp_equipment_list.expiration inner join elp_equipment_list_detail on elp_equipment_list_detail.equipment_list_id = elp_equipment_list.equipment_list_id inner join elp_equipment on elp_equipment_list_detail.equipment_id = elp_equipment.equipment_id inner join elp_manufacturer on elp_manufacturer.manufacturer_id = elp_equipment.manufacturer_id left outer join elp_mfg_standardization on elp_mfg_standardization.manufacturer_id = elp_manufacturer.manufacturer_id where elp_dealer.dealer = :dealer and (upper(elp_manufacturer.description) = upper(:manufacturer) or upper(elp_mfg_standardization.description) = upper(:manufacturer)) and GetTextForComparison(:model) = GetTextForComparison(elp_equipment.model) and rownum = 1
SQL.GET_EQUIPMENT_ID_BY_EQUIPMENTLIST: SELECT DISTINCT e.EQUIPMENT_ID AS ID FROM elita.ELP_EQUIPMENT e INNER JOIN elita.ELP_MANUFACTURER m ON e.MANUFACTURER_ID = m.MANUFACTURER_ID inner join elita.elp_equipment_list_detail elstd on e.equipment_id = elstd.equipment_id inner join elita.elp_equipment_list elst on elstd.equipment_list_id = elst.equipment_list_id WHERE elst.code = :equipment_list_code and :effective_date between e.effective and e.expiration and :effective_date between elst.effective and elst.expiration and :effective_date between elstd.effective and elstd.expiration and e.manufacturer_id = hextoraw(:manufacturerid) and GetTextForComparison(e.model) = GetTextForComparison(:model)
SQL.GET_EQUIPMENT_CLASS_ID_BY_EQUIPMENT_ID: select equipment_class_id from elp_equipment where equipment_id = :equipment_id
SQL.LOAD_EQUIPMENT_FOR_BENEFITS_LIST:
SELECT DISTINCT E.EQUIPMENT_ID, M.DESCRIPTION || ' / ' || E.MODEL AS DESCRIPTION, E.MODEL, M.DESCRIPTION AS MANUFACTURER FROM ELITA.ELP_EQUIPMENT E JOIN ELP_MANUFACTURER M ON E.MANUFACTURER_ID = M.MANUFACTURER_ID JOIN ELP_EQUIPMENT_LIST_DETAIL ELSTD ON E.EQUIPMENT_ID = ELSTD.EQUIPMENT_ID JOIN ELP_EQUIPMENT_LIST ELST ON ELSTD.EQUIPMENT_LIST_ID = ELST.EQUIPMENT_LIST_ID WHERE
:EFF_DATE BETWEEN ELST.EFFECTIVE AND ELST.EXPIRATION ORDER BY MANUFACTURER, MODEL
